name: gaming-store
description: Tienda online profesional para componentes gaming

scripts.dev:all: npm run sync:cloudinary && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm run docker:up && cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev && npm run seed && cd ../frontend && npm install
